channel.title: programming on Wilfred's Online Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in programming on Wilfred's Online Notebook

item.title: Pytudes
item.description: “An étude (a French word meaning study) is an instrumental musical composition, usually short, of considerable difficulty, and designed to provide practice material for perfecting a particular musical skill.” — Wikipedia This project contains pytudes—Python programs for perfecting programming skills. Some are in Jupyter (IPython) notebooks, some in .py files. You can view the files here, or clone the project, or run the notebooks online by clicking this button:
